name: Stunt Fish - Make your goldfish jump through as much turtles as you can to get more points
name_original: Stunt Fish - Make your goldfish jump through as much turtles as you can to get more points
description:
Addictive gameplay. Awesome artwork. Nice sound effects.

Play Stunt Fish and see how much points you can make jumping trough the turtles. But be careful! Sometimes you may spot a red turtle, they are not so friendly if you bother them!

Stunt Fish gives you more than 30 achievements in Game Center. This allows you to change the way you play to win every one of them, that's so addictive!

What else would you want from a game?

Enjoy Stunt Fish!
